channel.title: Joining ham servers help
channel.description:
i know this is in above post.
though it's not working.
i have hamachi.. i tried joining the hzpking server.
i put in the user wich says it's hzpking and i put in the pass wich it says the pass is 123.
done them. clicked join. then went to my client put in my user and pass then put in the hzpking ip wich is 5.117.99.180 then clicked log in and it said it's down etc.. but i tried this on 2 or 3 ham servers and all same thing. am i doing this wrong or are they just down?

item.title: Joining ham servers help
item.dc:creator: @xunb3atabl3x xunb3atabl3x
item.description:

though it’s not working.

i have hamachi… i tried joining the hzpking server.

done them. clicked join. then went to my client put in my user and pass then put in the hzpking ip wich is
5.117.99.180 then clicked log in and it said it’s down etc… but i tried this on 2 or 3 ham servers and all same thing. am i doing this wrong or are they just down?
